long_description: Made with recycled fabric, the soft-sided Patagonia 45L Transport M.L.C Luggage converts to a backpack, meets most airline carry-on requirements and holds most 17 in. laptops. Sturdy recycled PET twill fabric stands up to the rigors of travel; lining is smooth polyester. 3 carry options: backpack-style with ergonomic shoulder straps that zip away neatly; shoulder-bag style with comfortable strap; briefcase-style with 2 padded handles. Main zippered compartment opens like a book and features 2 separate compartments for easy packing and access; compression straps manage contents. Second zippered compartment holds shoes; 2 small zippered pockets organize travel essentials. Smaller pocket with key clip provides easy access to passport and tickets. Flat pocket holds magazines and documents. Patagonia Transport M.L.C Luggage 45L has a rear sleeve that slides over wheeled-luggage handles.
short_description: Made with recycled fabric, the soft-sided Patagonia 45L Transport M.L.C Luggage converts to a backpack, meets most airline carry-on requirements and holds most 17 in. laptops.
